name: Piriton 4mg tablet
description: Chlorpheniramine is an antihistamine used to relieve symptoms of allergy, hay fever, and the common cold. These symptoms include rash, watery eyes, itchy eyes/nose/throat/skin, cough, runny nose, and sneezing. This medicine works by blocking a certain natural substance (histamine) that your body makes during an allergic reaction.
label: medicine
